title: Hold My Beer
noResponses: Looks like no one dared to try this. Be the first to respond!
welcomeText: Hold My Beer is a social website where you can complete challenges from other users. Find a challenge you like and hit the respond button to get started. Anyone can make comments or vote on challenges and videos. We also introduce a new system: besides the voting on posts, there is the Amazing button. Each user can be Amazed only by 5 challenges per week. The most Amazing challenges will be featured at the top.
videoNotSupportedText: Your browser doesn't support video playback
